ygData.subject: Re: Mask of the deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: It s a no drop item (no trading) so you ll need to be there to loot it. And the mob is High 30 s like 38 or 39. Dartanian Veeshan
ygData.messageBody:
It's a no drop item (no trading) so you'll need to be there to loot it. And the
mob is High 30's like 38 or 39.

Dartanian
Veeshan

At 06:47 PM 6/23/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
> I'm a lvl 22 Cleric and would like to be heading to the LavaStorm Mtn's. Now
> of course I know I can get an invis and make the run but I'd kinda like to
> take the time to wonder around neriak and surrounding areas. Since I killed
> DE Guards for bronze so often I'm not KOS. I'm trying to locate the mask of
> deceivers which when worn and rt clicked will transform my appearance to that
> of a DE. Does anyone know where I can locate such an iteM?
>
> Duhas Alegulper
> Tarew Marr
